title: Do Summoner Icons count as skins? Of course they do.
body:
So for virtually no work on your part, Riot, let us unlock champion portraits as our Summoner Icons. Let us show off just how many games we have logged with a single champion.

Quick
Easy
Adds personalization to our accounts

Does anybody NOT want champion portraits as summoner icons? Because I do.

replies.body: This would be awesome. I would totally win, lets say, 50-100 games with a champ to get the splash for the summoner Icon. However, would we have the option of getting certain skin splashes as well as the original? Some champs have some rather unattractive defaults...... Hello NA Poppy

Great idea, 100 games would be cool. Also another idea: maybe the champion the summoner has played the most all time is available. When that summoner spams another champion and that other champion becomes their new most played, the old main disappears from their icon menu and the new most played enters. Just an idea to really make it special for each summoner.
Great Idea. Reminds me of SC2
